attributes.action: G4S Mangement fee should be increased
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned believe that G4S Mangement fee should be increased by the government to reflect the additional administration time that has been spent in liaising with both the media and parliamentary select committee as well as the enforced changes to their careful scheduling brought about by the additional security forces now employed

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is one for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games.
